item.description:
Angry Housewives Eating Bon Bons
Sometimes life is like a bad waiter—it serves you exactly what you don'twant. The women of Freesia Court have come together at life's table, fully convinced that there is nothing good coffee, delectable desserts, and a strong shoulder can't fix. Laughter is the glue that holds them together—the foundation of a book group they call AWEB—Angry Wives Eating Bon Bons—an unofficial "club" that becomes much more. It becomes a lifeline.

Let's discuss the book and have some treats offered at the Cape Cod Chat House:

Hot and iced Beanstock coffeeHot tea: organic mint, organic Earl Gray, mango, Meyer lemon, strawberry pomegranate, chamomile blend

Iced tea: wild raspberry or traditional

Nantucket Nectars Izze sodas Muffins: bran, harvest, blueberry, cranberry, cinnamon Scones Pastries Yogurt and granola Cookies and bar cookies Cakes and pies Soups Sandwiches Salads Quiches Individual-size pizzas
item.how_to_find_us: Nichole will be waiting for us inside!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Book Club- Cape Cod Chat House
